text: Yuri Vasilyevich Saukh () (September 14, 1951 – January 2, 2021) was a Soviet football player and Russian coach and manager. He played for the Soviet Union national football team in 1976. His playing career lasted from 1970 to 1981. He played for Rotor Volgograd, Rostov-on-Don, CSKA Moscow, Lokomotiv Moscow and Dynamo Stavropol. His managing career lasted from 2003 to 2007 where he managed for Reutov and Luch-Energiya Vladivostok. Saukh died on January 2, 2021 at the age of 69.Бывший футболист ЦСКА и "Локомотива" Саух скончался на 70-м году жизни ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Soviet footballers Category:Soviet football managers Category:Russian footballers Category:Russian football managers
title: Yuri Saukh
